DataElement.preferredName: Person Pathology Review And Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response indicating a patient meets the eligibility criteria for participation in a clinical trial regarding the evaluation and verification of pathology.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Pathology Review And Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._The medical science, and specialty practice, concerned with all aspects of disease, but with special reference to the essential nature, causes, and development of abnormal conditions, as well as the structural and functional changes that result from the disease processes. Informally used to mean the result of such an examination._The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._Having been established or verified._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has pathology been reviewed a
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has pathology been reviewed and confirmed at Mayo Clinic Department of Pathology?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has diagnosis of malignancy been confirmed by the department of pathology at the institution where the patient is enrolled prior to patient enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has evidence of CD19+ expression on leukemia cells been confirmed by pathology review of the bone marrow and/or peripheral blood specimens (flow cytometry and/or immunohistochemistry) collected at the time of current relapse and prior to the initiation of therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has final pathology been reviewed/confirmed as consistent with Histologic Diagnosis?

DataElement.changeDescription: 7/15/16 tt, released CDE.  7/14/16 tt, created for 9948.
